name: Wuhan Clan (itch)
description:
Wuhan Clan is a retro inspired pixel art platformer with a modern twist!

Play though 25 levels in 5 unique worlds to battle off a virus and save humanity. Along the way you'll face many obstacles and enemies, but with a little help and a variety of weapons to be found you may just be able to overcome them.

Find items and heal the sick to get to the top of the high score. There are many secrets to be found for those curious enough to seek them.
